0x00000014.description: Caluse 22 presence; DTE XS, PHY XS, PCS, WIS, PMD/PMA.
0x00000014.name: EthPcs100DevInPkg1

0x00000084.description: Base-R Latches and error counters; None roll-over; Clears on read;
0x00000084.name: EthPcs100BaseRStatus2

0x000000ac.description: Test Pattern Error Counter; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x000000ac.name: EthPcs100BaserTestErrCnt

0x000000b0.description: BER High Order Counter of BER bits 21:6; None roll-over.
0x000000b0.name: EthPcs100BerHighOrderCnt

0x000000b4.description: Error Blocks High Order Counter bits 21:8; None roll-over.
0x000000b4.name: EthPcs100ErrBlkHighOrderCnt

0x000000c8.description: Lane Alignment Status Bits and Block Lock lane 0 to 7.
0x000000c8.name: EthPcs100MultilaneAlignStat1

0x000000cc.description: Lane Alignment Block Lock lane 8 to 19.
0x000000cc.name: EthPcs100MultilaneAlignStat2

0x000000d0.description: Lane Alignment Marker Lock lane 0 to 7.
0x000000d0.name: EthPcs100MultilaneAlignStat3

0x000000d4.description: Lane Alignment Marker Lock lane 8 to 19.
0x000000d4.name: EthPcs100MultilaneAlignStat4

0x00000320.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 0; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000320.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane0

0x00000324.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 1; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000324.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane1

0x00000328.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 2; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000328.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane2

0x0000032c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 3; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x0000032c.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane3

0x00000330.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 4; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000330.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane4

0x00000334.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 5; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000334.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane5

0x00000338.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 6; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000338.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane6

0x0000033c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 7; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x0000033c.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane7

0x00000340.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 8; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000340.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane8

0x00000344.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 9; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000344.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane9

0x00000348.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 10; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000348.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane10

0x0000034c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 11; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x0000034c.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane11

0x00000350.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 12; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000350.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane12

0x00000354.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 13; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000354.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane13

0x00000358.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 14; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000358.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane14

0x0000035c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 15; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x0000035c.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane15

0x00000360.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 16; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000360.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane16

0x00000364.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 17; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000364.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane17

0x00000368.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 18; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x00000368.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane18

0x0000036c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 19; Clears on read; None roll-over
0x0000036c.name: EthPcs100BipErrCntLane19

0x00008004.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Core Revision derived from DEV_VERSION package parameter.
0x00008004.name: EthPcs100VendorCoreRev

0x00008008.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Set the amount of data between markers. (I.e. distance of markers-1).
0x00008008.name: EthPcs100VendorVlIntvl

fields.description: Test pattern error counter; Clears on read; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsCounter

fields.description: Bits 21:6 of BER counter; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBerCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 0; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 1; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 10; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 11; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 12; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 13; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 14; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 15; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 16; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 17; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 18; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 19; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 2; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 3; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 4; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 5; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 6; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 7; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 8; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter for lane 9; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErrorCounter

fields.description: PCS type selection; Reads 101 for 2:0 fixed to 100GBase-R.
fields.name: EthPcsTypeSelection

fields.description: Bits 21:8 of Error Blocks counter; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErroredBlocksCounter

fields.description: Lane alignment status; 1=All Receive lanes locked and aligned.
fields.name: EthPcsLaneAlignStatus

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 100G; (Only this bit set in this register).
fields.name: EthPcsSpeed100GCapable

fields.description: When '1', indicates a fault condition idetected; When '0', indicates that no fault condition is detected.
fields.name: EthPcsFault

fields.description: When '1', indicates PCS receive link up; When '0', indicates PCS receive link is or was down (latching low).
fields.name: EthPcsRcvLinkStatus

fields.description: Set to '1' to indicate that the PCS implements a low power mode.
fields.name: EthPcsLowPowerAble

fields.description: Device present. When bits are 10 = device responding at this address.
fields.name: EthPcsDevPresent

fields.description: Transmit fault. 1=Fault condition on transmit path. Latched high
fields.name: EthPcsTransmitFault

fields.description: Receive fault. 1=Fault condition on receive path. Latched high
fields.name: EthPcsReceiveFault

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 100GBase-R capable; always 1.
fields.name: EthPcs100GBaseRCapable

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 40GBase-R capable; always 0.
fields.name: EthPcs40GBaseRCapable

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 10GBase-T capable; always 0.
fields.name: EthPcs10GBaseTCapable

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 10GBase-W capable; always 0.
fields.name: EthPcs10GBaseWCapable

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 10GBase-X capable; always 0.
fields.name: EthPcs10GBaseXCapable

fields.description: When 1, this PCS is 10GBase-R capable; always 0.
fields.name: EthPcs10GBaseRCapable

fields.description: Core Design version as defined by DEV_VERSION parameter in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsRevision

fields.description: Scratch Register; Register address to test read and write operation.
fields.name: EthPcsScratch

fields.description: A 16-bit value defining the amount of data between markers; (distance of markers-1).
fields.name: EthPcsMarkerCounter
